Post.title: amd4700geall in one
Post.subtitle: all in boom
Post._content:
AIO24*7cpuamd4700geuOEM CPUAMD 4700ge 816 TDP 35 6 : MAG B550M MORTAR WIFI 2 * 16G P5 1T 850 UPSSVC BX1450L 4 * 8T(WD80PURX) win10816: amd vega radeon cpuz: cpuz: cpu5335300 P5 P5 8g3000
---
biosamdupve pve7web
## apt update apt upgrade -y apt install curl ufw lm-sensors apt-transport-https ca-certificates htop parted ncdu nethogs net-tools ethtool iperf3 vim git fail2ban smartmontools neofetch hollywood lshw cpufrequtils screen -y vim /etc/fail2ban/jail.conf, bantime60m fail2ban-client status sshd
## cpu watch -n 2 "cat /proc/cpuinfo | grep MHz"
## cpu apt install cpufrequtils cpufreq-info bash -c 'for ((i=0;i<$(nproc);i++)); do cpufreq-set -c $i -g powersave; done' bash -c 'for ((i=0;i<$(nproc);i++)); do cpufreq-set -c $i -g ondemand; done' bash -c 'for ((i=0;i<$(nproc);i++)); do cpufreq-set -c $i -g performance; done'
## apt install lm-sensors sensors
## pvetools https://github.com/ivanhao/pvetools
## ufw apt install ufw ufw status ufw allow 22/tcp ufw enable ufw allow 8006/tcp ufw allow 4000/tcp iptables -L
## swap 32g dd if=/dev/zero of=/swapfile bs=1M count=32768 chown root:root /swapfile chmod 0600 /swapfile mkswap /swapfile swapon /swapfile /etc/fstab/dev/pve/swap/swapfile
## iperf3 pveserver: iperf3 -s -p 4000 pveubuntuclient: iperf3 -p 4000 -c 192.168.2.150
## pve win1020 pvewin10 3 pvewin10cpuhost win103% pvewin10IDE pvewin10SCSI SCSI SCSIwin10 [https://pve.proxmox.com/wiki/Pci_passthrough#AMD_CPU](https://pve.proxmox.com/wiki/Pci_passthrough#AMD_CPU) [https://mechanical-consciousness.com/2020/03/20/kvm-gpu-passthrough.html](https://mechanical-consciousness.com/2020/03/20/kvm-gpu-passthrough.html) [https://post.smzdm.com/p/alpwlzvp/ ](https://post.smzdm.com/p/alpwlzvp/ ) pve8.1 GRUB_CMDLINE_LINUX_DEFAULT="quiet intel_pstate=disable amd_iommu=on iommu=pt textonly pcie_acs_override=downstream,multifunction initcall_blacklist=sysfb_init" win102 230702.5G93070win10pvePCI 3070172.5G20 AX20019 pveopenwrtcpuhost pvedebianserver: iperf3 -s -p 4000 pveubuntuclient: iperf3 -p 4000 -c 192.168.2.103 pve2win10 ## upsusbwin10-miner
bashpvevmvmqemu-guest-agent mkdir -p /root/shutdown cd /root/shutdown touch shutdown.sh chmod +x shutdown.sh ``` #!/bin/sh # apt install curl -y ip="192.168.2.x" # ip which will detecting time=30 # interval time of detecting (seconds) triedCount=12 # try count failCount=0 # failed count chat_id="" telegramToken="" path="/root/shutdown/" while true do date=`date +%Y-%m-%d` logfile=$path$date'.log' hostname=hostname echo "Detected hostname: `${hostname}`" >> $logfile notification="curl -X POST --header 'Content-Type: application/json' --data-raw '{\"chat_id\":\"$chat_id\",\"text\":\"`$hostname` is shutting down.\"}' -m 10 https://api.telegram.org/bot$telegramToken/sendMessage" # eval $notification now=`date +%Y-%m-%d\ %H:%M:%S` # if ping $ip -4 -c 2 | grep 'time=' > $path'temp.log' if ping $ip -4 -c 2 | grep 'time=' >> $logfile then echo $now 'ping success' $failCount >> $logfile failCount=0 else failCount=`expr $failCount + 1` echo $now 'ping failed' $failCount >> $logfile if test $failCount -ge $triedCount then echo $now 'execute shutdown' >> $logfile eval $notification shutdown -h now fi fi sleep $time done ``` pve30ping192.168.2.x126telegramups vim /etc/rc.loacl ``` #!/bin/bash cd /root/shutdown/ && nohup ./shutdown.sh > /dev/null 2>&1 & #exit 0 ``` chmod +x /etc/rc.loacl reboot
Post.raw:
--- title: amd4700geall in one catalog: true date: 2022-03-31 21:25:00 subtitle: all in boom sticky: 999 header-img: /img/header_img/newhome_bg.jpg tags: - amd4700ge - AIO - all in one - pve - proxmox categories: - network --- AIO24*7cpuamd4700geuOEM CPUAMD 4700ge 816 TDP 35 6 : MAG B550M MORTAR WIFI 2 * 16G P5 1T 850 UPSSVC BX1450L 4 * 8T(WD80PURX) win10816: amd vega radeon cpuz: cpuz: cpu5335300 P5 P5 8g3000
---

## cpu apt install cpufrequtils cpufreq-info bash -c 'for ((i=0;i<$(nproc);i++)); do cpufreq-set -c $i -g powersave; done' bash -c 'for ((i=0;i<$(nproc);i++)); do cpufreq-set -c $i -g ondemand; done' bash -c 'for ((i=0;i<$(nproc);i++)); do cpufreq-set -c $i -g performance; done'

## iperf3 pveserver: iperf3 -s -p 4000 pveubuntuclient: iperf3 -p 4000 -c 192.168.2.150
## pve win1020 pvewin10 3 pvewin10cpuhost win103% pvewin10IDE pvewin10SCSI SCSI SCSIwin10 [https://pve.proxmox.com/wiki/Pci_passthrough#AMD_CPU](https://pve.proxmox.com/wiki/Pci_passthrough#AMD_CPU) [https://mechanical-consciousness.com/2020/03/20/kvm-gpu-passthrough.html](https://mechanical-consciousness.com/2020/03/20/kvm-gpu-passthrough.html) [https://post.smzdm.com/p/alpwlzvp/ ](https://post.smzdm.com/p/alpwlzvp/ ) pve8.1 GRUB_CMDLINE_LINUX_DEFAULT="quiet intel_pstate=disable amd_iommu=on iommu=pt textonly pcie_acs_override=downstream,multifunction initcall_blacklist=sysfb_init" win102 230702.5G93070win10pvePCI 3070172.5G20 AX20019 pveopenwrtcpuhost pvedebianserver: iperf3 -s -p 4000 pveubuntuclient: iperf3 -p 4000 -c 192.168.2.103 pve2win10 ## upsusbwin10-miner
bashpvevmvmqemu-guest-agent mkdir -p /root/shutdown cd /root/shutdown touch shutdown.sh chmod +x shutdown.sh ``` #!/bin/sh # apt install curl -y ip="192.168.2.x" # ip which will detecting time=30 # interval time of detecting (seconds) triedCount=12 # try count failCount=0 # failed count chat_id="" telegramToken="" path="/root/shutdown/" while true do date=`date +%Y-%m-%d` logfile=$path$date'.log' hostname=hostname echo "Detected hostname: `${hostname}`" >> $logfile notification="curl -X POST --header 'Content-Type: application/json' --data-raw '{\"chat_id\":\"$chat_id\",\"text\":\"`$hostname` is shutting down.\"}' -m 10 https://api.telegram.org/bot$telegramToken/sendMessage" # eval $notification now=`date +%Y-%m-%d\ %H:%M:%S` # if ping $ip -4 -c 2 | grep 'time=' > $path'temp.log' if ping $ip -4 -c 2 | grep 'time=' >> $logfile then echo $now 'ping success' $failCount >> $logfile failCount=0 else failCount=`expr $failCount + 1` echo $now 'ping failed' $failCount >> $logfile if test $failCount -ge $triedCount then echo $now 'execute shutdown' >> $logfile eval $notification shutdown -h now fi fi sleep $time done ``` pve30ping192.168.2.x126telegramups vim /etc/rc.loacl ``` #!/bin/bash cd /root/shutdown/ && nohup ./shutdown.sh > /dev/null 2>&1 & #exit 0 ``` chmod +x /etc/rc.loacl reboot

Post.title: pveopenwrt
Post.subtitle: openwrt
Post._content:
# img.gzimg pve7: /var/lib/vz/template/iso
# vm ios
# sshpve ssh root@192.168.2.123 : cd /var/lib/vz/template/iso : qm importdisk 100 /var/lib/vz/template/iso/openwrt-2022-03-27-x86-64-generic-squashfs-combined.img local-lvm
# 5G

# . WAN cpuvt-dpci 4 Intel I226-V openwrt : pvevmbr0enp2s0 pci apt install lshw -y lshw -class network enp2s0 pci 0000:02:00:0 DISABLED vm0000:03:00:0 openwrtLANpciWANMAC

# . cpuvt-dJ1900N3160pveWAN openwrtWAN

# start at bootYes boot order
qemu guest agentpvevm

# openwrt pve webssh vim /etc/config/network lanip192.168.2.1 : /etc/init.d/network restart openwrt diskman5Gext4/optdockeroptoverlay sshdf -Th

# cpu ssh: cd /etc && ./coremark.sh /sbin/cpumark: cpumark /sbin/coremark: coremark

# opkg install iperf3 server: iperf3 -s -p 4000 client: iperf3 -p 4000 -c 192.168.2.1 n31607800

# ashbash ash opkg update && opkg install bash /etc/passwd root /bin/ash /bin/bash /etc/shells shell /bin/ash /bin/bash /bin/rbash vimopkg install vim bashvim ~/.inputrc "\e[A": history-search-backward "\e[B": history-search-forward set show-all-if-ambiguous on set completion-ignore-case on vim ~/.bashrc HISTSIZE=-1 HISTFILESIZE=-1 alias ll='ls -alhFtr' alias la='ls -A' alias l='ls -CF' source ~/.bashrc

# [https://www.betaflare.com/3730.html](https://www.betaflare.com/3730.html)

# session vim /etc/config/luci 7 option sessiontime '604800'

# qemu guest agent opkg install qemu-ga pveopenwrt ip

# pveopenwrt : ethtool -s eth0 speed 1000 duplex full : vim /etc/init.d/network

# ddns ipv4 804438443 cloudflarednsAip1.1.1.1 openwrtddns ddns .@ ddnscf dns 1.1.1.1 ipping

# ssl weblinuxdebiandockernginxacme.sh nginx cd ~/projects/ && mkdir nginx && mkdir nginx/conf.d && mkdir nginx/conf.d/certs docker run --rm -d --name nginx nginx docker cp nginx:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf ~/projects/nginx/nginx.conf docker stop nginx nginx: docker run -d --restart=always --name nginx -v /home/www/projects/nginx/nginx.conf:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf:ro -v /home/www/projects/nginx/conf.d:/etc/nginx/conf.d:ro --network=host nginx acme.sh curl https://get.acme.sh | sh -s email=yourName@gmail.com exitacme.sh acme.sh export CF_Token="" export CF_Account_ID="" export CF_Zone_ID="" dns[https://github.com/acmesh-official/acme.sh/wiki/dnsapi](https://github.com/acmesh-official/acme.sh/wiki/dnsapi) Issue cert: acme.sh --issue -d '*.example.com' --dns dns_cf --dnssleep 120 --debug 2 --server letsencrypt Install cert: acme.sh --install-cert -d '*.example.com' --key-file /home/www/projects/nginx/conf.d/certs/*.example.com.privkey.pem --fullchain-file /home/www/projects/nginx/conf.d/certs/*.example.com.fullchain.pem --reloadcmd "docker exec -it nginx nginx -s reload" --debug 2 acmessl crontab -l 16 0 * * * "/home/www/.acme.sh"/acme.sh --cron --home "/home/www/.acme.sh" > /home/www/acme.log openwrtvim /home/www/projects/nginx/conf.d/openwrt.conf ``` server{ listen 80; server_name openwrt.example.com; client_max_body_size 200M; #access_log /data/logs/nginx_json/access.log json; return 301 https://$host$request_uri; } server{ listen 443 ssl; server_name openwrt.example.com; gzip on; gzip_min_length 1k; gzip_buffers 16 64k; gzip_http_version 1.1; gzip_comp_level 3; gzip_types text/plain application/x-javascript application/javascript text/javascript text/css application/xml application/x-httpd-php image/jpeg image/gif image/png; gzip_vary on; client_max_body_size 200M; #access_log /data/logs/nginx_json/access.log json; ssl_certificate /etc/nginx/conf.d/certs/*.example.com.fullchain.pem; ssl_certificate_key /etc/nginx/conf.d/certs/*.example.com.privkey.pem; ssl_session_timeout 5m; ssl_ciphers ECDHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:ECDHE:ECDH:AES:HIGH:!NULL:!aNULL:!MD5:!ADH:!RC4; ssl_protocols TLSv1 TLSv1.1 TLSv1.2; ssl_prefer_server_ciphers on; # Prevent crawling if ($http_user_agent ~* "360Spider|JikeSpider|Spider|spider|bot|Bot|2345Explorer|curl|wget|webZIP|qihoobot|Baiduspider|Googlebot|Googlebot-Mobile|Googlebot-Image|Mediapartners-Google|Adsbot-Google|Feedfetcher-Google|Yahoo! Slurp|Yahoo! Slurp China|YoudaoBot|Sosospider|Sogou spider|Sogou web spider|MSNBot|ia_archiver|Tomato Bot|NSPlayer|bingbot"){ return 403; } location / { proxy_read_timeout 60m; proxy_set_header Host $host; proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto https; proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for; proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr; proxy_set_header Connection "upgrade"; proxy_redirect off; proxy_pass http://192.168.2.1:80; } error_page 500 502 503 504 /50x.html; #location = /50x.html { # root /data/www/error/; #} } ``` nginx: docker ps -a nginx: docker logs -f --tail 500 nginx

# > debianip192.168.2.1038443/tcpdebian443/tcp https://openwrt.example.com:8443 openwrt
Post.raw:

# ashbash ash opkg update && opkg install bash /etc/passwd root /bin/ash /bin/bash /etc/shells shell /bin/ash /bin/bash /bin/rbash vimopkg install vim bashvim ~/.inputrc "\e[A": history-search-backward "\e[B": history-search-forward set show-all-if-ambiguous on set completion-ignore-case on vim ~/.bashrc HISTSIZE=-1 HISTFILESIZE=-1 alias ll='ls -alhFtr' alias la='ls -A' alias l='ls -CF' source ~/.bashrc

# [https://www.betaflare.com/3730.html](https://www.betaflare.com/3730.html)

# session vim /etc/config/luci 7 option sessiontime '604800'

# pveopenwrt : ethtool -s eth0 speed 1000 duplex full : vim /etc/init.d/network

# ddns ipv4 804438443 cloudflarednsAip1.1.1.1 openwrtddns ddns .@ ddnscf dns 1.1.1.1 ipping

# ssl weblinuxdebiandockernginxacme.sh nginx cd ~/projects/ && mkdir nginx && mkdir nginx/conf.d && mkdir nginx/conf.d/certs docker run --rm -d --name nginx nginx docker cp nginx:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf ~/projects/nginx/nginx.conf docker stop nginx nginx: docker run -d --restart=always --name nginx -v /home/www/projects/nginx/nginx.conf:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf:ro -v /home/www/projects/nginx/conf.d:/etc/nginx/conf.d:ro --network=host nginx acme.sh curl https://get.acme.sh | sh -s email=yourName@gmail.com exitacme.sh acme.sh export CF_Token="" export CF_Account_ID="" export CF_Zone_ID="" dns[https://github.com/acmesh-official/acme.sh/wiki/dnsapi](https://github.com/acmesh-official/acme.sh/wiki/dnsapi) Issue cert: acme.sh --issue -d '*.example.com' --dns dns_cf --dnssleep 120 --debug 2 --server letsencrypt Install cert: acme.sh --install-cert -d '*.example.com' --key-file /home/www/projects/nginx/conf.d/certs/*.example.com.privkey.pem --fullchain-file /home/www/projects/nginx/conf.d/certs/*.example.com.fullchain.pem --reloadcmd "docker exec -it nginx nginx -s reload" --debug 2 acmessl crontab -l 16 0 * * * "/home/www/.acme.sh"/acme.sh --cron --home "/home/www/.acme.sh" > /home/www/acme.log openwrtvim /home/www/projects/nginx/conf.d/openwrt.conf ``` server{ listen 80; server_name openwrt.example.com; client_max_body_size 200M; #access_log /data/logs/nginx_json/access.log json; return 301 https://$host$request_uri; } server{ listen 443 ssl; server_name openwrt.example.com; gzip on; gzip_min_length 1k; gzip_buffers 16 64k; gzip_http_version 1.1; gzip_comp_level 3; gzip_types text/plain application/x-javascript application/javascript text/javascript text/css application/xml application/x-httpd-php image/jpeg image/gif image/png; gzip_vary on; client_max_body_size 200M; #access_log /data/logs/nginx_json/access.log json; ssl_certificate /etc/nginx/conf.d/certs/*.example.com.fullchain.pem; ssl_certificate_key /etc/nginx/conf.d/certs/*.example.com.privkey.pem; ssl_session_timeout 5m; ssl_ciphers ECDHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:ECDHE:ECDH:AES:HIGH:!NULL:!aNULL:!MD5:!ADH:!RC4; ssl_protocols TLSv1 TLSv1.1 TLSv1.2; ssl_prefer_server_ciphers on; # Prevent crawling if ($http_user_agent ~* "360Spider|JikeSpider|Spider|spider|bot|Bot|2345Explorer|curl|wget|webZIP|qihoobot|Baiduspider|Googlebot|Googlebot-Mobile|Googlebot-Image|Mediapartners-Google|Adsbot-Google|Feedfetcher-Google|Yahoo! Slurp|Yahoo! Slurp China|YoudaoBot|Sosospider|Sogou spider|Sogou web spider|MSNBot|ia_archiver|Tomato Bot|NSPlayer|bingbot"){ return 403; } location / { proxy_read_timeout 60m; proxy_set_header Host $host; proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto https; proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for; proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr; proxy_set_header Connection "upgrade"; proxy_redirect off; proxy_pass http://192.168.2.1:80; } error_page 500 502 503 504 /50x.html; #location = /50x.html { # root /data/www/error/; #} } ``` nginx: docker ps -a nginx: docker logs -f --tail 500 nginx

weblinuxdebiandockernginxacme.sh

nginx
cd ~/projects/ && mkdir nginx && mkdir nginx/conf.d && mkdir nginx/conf.d/certs
docker run --rm -d --name nginx nginx
docker cp nginx:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf ~/projects/nginx/nginx.conf
docker stop nginx

nginx:
docker run -d --restart=always --name nginx -v /home/www/projects/nginx/nginx.conf:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf:ro -v /home/www/projects/nginx/conf.d:/etc/nginx/conf.d:ro --network=host nginx

acme.sh
curl https://get.acme.sh | sh -s email=yourName@gmail.com

exitacme.sh

acme.sh
export CF_Token=
export CF_Account_ID=
export CF_Zone_ID=

dnshttps://github.com/acmesh-official/acme.sh/wiki/dnsapi

Issue cert:

acme.sh --issue -d '*.example.com' --dns dns_cf --dnssleep 120 --debug 2 --server letsencrypt

Install cert:

acme.sh --install-cert -d '*.example.com' --key-file /home/www/projects/nginx/conf.d/certs/*.example.com.privkey.pem --fullchain-file /home/www/projects/nginx/conf.d/certs/*.example.com.fullchain.pem --reloadcmd "docker exec -it nginx nginx -s reload" --debug 2

acmessl
crontab -l
16 0 * * * /home/www/.acme.sh/acme.sh --cron --home /home/www/.acme.sh > /home/www/acme.log

openwrtvim /home/www/projects/nginx/conf.d/openwrt.conf

nginx: docker ps -a

nginx: docker logs -f --tail 500 nginx

Post.title: wireguard
Post._content:
todesksshfrp77:
vpnvpn frp77vpn vpnwireguard2ipipwg
# ip ## ipAipddnsddnsopenwrt
dockerddns: home.example.com docker run -d --name=cf-ddns --restart=always -e API_KEY=*** -e ZONE=example.com -e SUBDOMAIN=home oznu/cloudflare-ddns https://github.com/favonia/cloudflare-ddns ## wg openwrtdockerwgwg: ``` mkdir -p /opt/wg-easy docker run -d \ --name=wireguard \ -e WG_HOST=home.example.com \ -e WG_PORT=54321 \ -e PASSWORD=yourPassword \ -e WG_DEFAULT_DNS=192.168.2.1 \ -e WG_DEFAULT_ADDRESS=10.13.1.x \ -e WG_ALLOWED_IPS=192.168.2.0/24 \ -e WG_PERSISTENT_KEEPALIVE=10 \ -e TZ=Asia/Shanghai \ -e UI_TRAFFIC_STATS=true \ -v /opt/wg-easy:/etc/wireguard \ -p 54321:51820/udp \ -p 51821:51821/tcp \ --cap-add=NET_ADMIN \ --cap-add=SYS_MODULE \ --sysctl="net.ipv4.conf.all.src_valid_mark=1" \ --sysctl="net.ipv4.ip_forward=1" \ --restart unless-stopped \ ghcr.io/wg-easy/wg-easy ```
## openwrtwan -> -> wgdebianip192.168.2.10354321/udpdebian54321/udp
## SFE Turbo ACCSFE
## peer wg: [http://192.168.2.103:51821](http://192.168.2.103:51821)peer
##
wg iphoneapp storewg 4g wgAllowed IPs0.0.0.0/0peer
# ip ipvpsvps frp54321/udp4001/udpwg4001/udp ## frp vim /opt/frpc.ini ``` [common] server_addr = vpsip server_port = 2000 protocol = tcp token = password [wireguard_web] type = tcp local_ip = 127.0.0.1 local_port = 51821 remote_port = 4000 use_encryption = true use_compression = true [wireguard_udp] type = udp local_ip = 127.0.0.1 local_port = 54321 remote_port = 4001 use_encryption = true use_compression = true ``` frp docker run -d --name frpc --restart=always -v /opt/frpc.ini:/etc/frp/frpc.ini --network=host snowdreamtech/frpc
## wg wireguard ``` mkdir -p /opt/wg-easy docker run -d \ --name=wireguard \ -e WG_HOST=vpsip \ -e WG_PORT=4001 \ -e PASSWORD=yourPassword \ -e WG_DEFAULT_DNS=192.168.2.1 \ -e WG_DEFAULT_ADDRESS=10.13.100.x \ -e WG_ALLOWED_IPS=192.168.2.0/24 \ -e WG_PERSISTENT_KEEPALIVE=10 \ -e TZ=Asia/Shanghai \ -e UI_TRAFFIC_STATS=true \ -v /opt/wg-easy:/etc/wireguard \ -p 54321:51820/udp \ -p 51821:51821/tcp \ --cap-add=NET_ADMIN \ --cap-add=SYS_MODULE \ --sysctl="net.ipv4.conf.all.src_valid_mark=1" \ --sysctl="net.ipv4.ip_forward=1" \ --restart unless-stopped \ ghcr.io/wg-easy/wg-easy ``` vpswg

dockerddns: home.example.com docker run -d --name=cf-ddns --restart=always -e API_KEY=*** -e ZONE=example.com -e SUBDOMAIN=home oznu/cloudflare-ddns https://github.com/favonia/cloudflare-ddns ## wg openwrtdockerwgwg: ``` mkdir -p /opt/wg-easy docker run -d \ --name=wireguard \ -e WG_HOST=home.example.com \ -e WG_PORT=54321 \ -e PASSWORD=yourPassword \ -e WG_DEFAULT_DNS=192.168.2.1 \ -e WG_DEFAULT_ADDRESS=10.13.1.x \ -e WG_ALLOWED_IPS=192.168.2.0/24 \ -e WG_PERSISTENT_KEEPALIVE=10 \ -e TZ=Asia/Shanghai \ -e UI_TRAFFIC_STATS=true \ -v /opt/wg-easy:/etc/wireguard \ -p 54321:51820/udp \ -p 51821:51821/tcp \ --cap-add=NET_ADMIN \ --cap-add=SYS_MODULE \ --sysctl="net.ipv4.conf.all.src_valid_mark=1" \ --sysctl="net.ipv4.ip_forward=1" \ --restart unless-stopped \ ghcr.io/wg-easy/wg-easy ```
## openwrtwan -> -> wgdebianip192.168.2.10354321/udpdebian54321/udp
## SFE Turbo ACCSFE
## peer wg: [http://192.168.2.103:51821](http://192.168.2.103:51821)peer
##
wg iphoneapp storewg 4g wgAllowed IPs0.0.0.0/0peer
# ip ipvpsvps frp54321/udp4001/udpwg4001/udp ## frp vim /opt/frpc.ini ``` [common] server_addr = vpsip server_port = 2000 protocol = tcp token = password [wireguard_web] type = tcp local_ip = 127.0.0.1 local_port = 51821 remote_port = 4000 use_encryption = true use_compression = true [wireguard_udp] type = udp local_ip = 127.0.0.1 local_port = 54321 remote_port = 4001 use_encryption = true use_compression = true ``` frp docker run -d --name frpc --restart=always -v /opt/frpc.ini:/etc/frp/frpc.ini --network=host snowdreamtech/frpc
## wg wireguard ``` mkdir -p /opt/wg-easy docker run -d \ --name=wireguard \ -e WG_HOST=vpsip \ -e WG_PORT=4001 \ -e PASSWORD=yourPassword \ -e WG_DEFAULT_DNS=192.168.2.1 \ -e WG_DEFAULT_ADDRESS=10.13.100.x \ -e WG_ALLOWED_IPS=192.168.2.0/24 \ -e WG_PERSISTENT_KEEPALIVE=10 \ -e TZ=Asia/Shanghai \ -e UI_TRAFFIC_STATS=true \ -v /opt/wg-easy:/etc/wireguard \ -p 54321:51820/udp \ -p 51821:51821/tcp \ --cap-add=NET_ADMIN \ --cap-add=SYS_MODULE \ --sysctl="net.ipv4.conf.all.src_valid_mark=1" \ --sysctl="net.ipv4.ip_forward=1" \ --restart unless-stopped \ ghcr.io/wg-easy/wg-easy ``` vpswg
